channel.title: 317 Update packet
channel.description:
Hi,
Me and a friend are working on a runescape 317 server from scratch using netty. We're at the point now where the initialize the player and have to send it's first update packet.
However, we don't know what to put in the packet. The RSWiki doesn't contain specific information on what has to be sent. ([url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Begin_player_updating]https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Begin_player_updating[/url])
We tried looking at some open sourced servers at github but we find it very confusing to use it since they already have classes for players, equipment, etc. Does anyone here have information about what needs to be sent in the update packet with the right order?
We currently only have this ([url=https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol#Player_Updating]https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol#Player_Updating[/url]) but this doesn't say specifically what has to be in the packet.

item.title: 317 Update packet
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Follow the updatePlayers method here: https://github.com/Jameskmonger/317refactor/blob/master/src/com/jagex/runescape/Client.java#L11452

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Update packet
item.dc:creator: @mike0631 mike0631
item.description:
@mike0631 wrote:

Hi,

Me and a friend are working on a runescape 317 server from scratch using netty.
We’re at the point now where the initialize the player and have to send it’s first update packet.

However, we don’t know what to put in the packet.
The RSWiki doesn’t contain specific information on what has to be sent. (https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Begin_player_updating)

We tried looking at some open sourced servers at github but we find it very confusing to use it since they already have classes for players, equipment, etc.
Does anyone here have information about what needs to be sent in the update packet with the right order?

We currently only have this (https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol#Player_Updating) but this doesn’t say specifically what has to be in the packet.
